metadata.synopsis: The player characters comment on an aspect of the Morninglord, Lathander.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Turn on Roll Amazing- Go to 73; 11; 5. on CRE_Main_A- Succeed on the Religion Check

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Undead crushed underfoot. The Dawnlord certainly knows how to make space for new life.
